title: Pont Blank (Eclipse)
description:
'Point Blank' jimmies open the plane door and bails the hell out as the ECUP continues!

Details are scarce on this one. Point Blank was a two-issue black and white magazine co-published by Eclipse with John Brown/Acme Press. It's tagline was 'the Best of European Strip Art'. Several ongoing stories run in each issue and it was apparently expected to be a regularly-published mag, based on the previews and subscription forms. Interestingly, these copies seem to be from Britain, as the primary price on the cover is in Pounds; the advertisements support this theory. I do not recognize any of the creators' names but the linework is very nice, with some of it reminding me of Jordi Bernet of 'Torpedo' fame.

Within are both issues. Creative teams - thanks! Scanners - ditto! Euroget it, Euroseed it!
